pr_title: Enable aliases to show up for organizations and workflow versions in swagger output

timeline.message: enable aliases to show up for organizations and workflow versions
add tests for organization and collection aliases to be returned
add tests for workflow version alias in return from API call
only fetch workflow version aliases if specified in include parameter

timeline.bodyText: Do we want the include parameter here? Not many orgs, so maybe performance isn't an issue here.
timeline.author: coverbeck

replies.bodyText: I will leave it as is and create a new ticket if that feature is needed...
replies.author: wshands

timeline.message: add aliases parameter to comment about include

timeline.bodyText:
Use a constant string for "aliases" and use it both here and in the (now badly named) initializeValidations method.
That way, someone won't accidentally rename one but not the other.
Should also do the same for validations while in the neighbourhood.
timeline.author: denis-yuen

timeline.message: make string constants for include strings
